ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
Contains at least one [1..*] component1 with data type Current Medication Section Component
Contains at least one [1..*] component2 with data type Cardiac Arrest Section Component

Contains zero or more [0..*] vitalSignsSection, where its type is Vital Signs Section
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Signs Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23)
Contains at least one [1..*] component with data type Component3
Contains at least one [1..*] component1 with data type Current Medication Section Component
Contains at least one [1..*] component2 with data type Cardiac Arrest Section Component

Contains zero or more [0..*] vitalSignsSection, where its type is Vital Signs Section
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Signs Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23)
